article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers in Michigan
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers in Michigan.
article.content:
​​Welcome to the U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce. The U.S. Commercial Service is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small and medium sized companies with U.S. export sales and marketing.

The Commercial Service has four local offices, called U.S. Export Assistance Centers (USEAC), in the state of Michigan.

Our offices are part of a large domestic and international network consisting of over 250 offices in 82 countries designed to support U.S. international business development needs. Our offices are directly linked with our overseas establishments located in the U.S. Embassies and Consulates.

Our offices are small, high-activity centers, staffed by highly experienced trade specialists. We serve the highly diverse and multi-cultural business communities of Michigan.

We embody the goals of the mission statement of the US Commercial Service. For more information on how we can help your company with its exporting strategies, please visitour services.

Contact Information
